thread.title: Douglas L Danford
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Douglas L Danford

author: Douglas L Danford
title: Douglas L Danford
text: After several days and long waits, everything is now clean and the lap top is up and running smoothly. The reason for the slowness was because of a problem with our Internet carrier. Very grateful for the time spent helping, and the technicians were very thorough as well as patient.
